attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hi this petition is to stop manufacturers and retailers using the words such as MAGIC etc in there products because its plain to see that they are not and never will be magic(THE MEANING OF MAGIC IS  The art that purports to control or forecast natural events, effects, or forces by invoking the supernatural or Possessing distinctive qualities that produce unaccountable or baffling effects,or A mysterious quality of enchantment)
therefore the use of the word MAGIC and any other words used to make out that products have some mystical properties is untrue and should not be used too sell prducts and should be removed from packaging and advertising

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
